pageContext.claim: “Border Patrol Agents want the Wall.” Democrat’s say they don't want the Wall (even though they know it is really needed), and they don't want ICE. They don't have much to campaign on, do they? An Open Southern Border and the large scale crime that comes with such stupidity!
pageContext.analysis: Some Democrats have been calling to abolish U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement, but it’s not a widely held position and some Democrats say the agency should be reformed, not abolished. In any case, ICE is only one of several agencies tasked with immigration enforcement. Most independent research contradicts the idea that illegal immigrants bring more crime.
